long_description: The full-featured Metolius Contact training board has an amazing variety of holds to help you increase strength and improve your climbing performance. Includes 11 pockets to choose from, 4 central edges that range from shallow to deep, top-mounted pull-up jugs, and rounded and flat slopers. Ergonomic curve of the training board is designed to limit joint stress. Fine texture gives you just the right amount of grip without tearing up your fingers. Includes complete instructions, a training guide and mounting hardware. The Metolius Contact training board comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The full-featured Metolius Contact training board has an amazing variety of holds to help you increase strength and improve your climbing performance.
